Articles.Content:
Can I move my save from 0.25 to 0.90?

If so, do I have to start back with Level 1 everything.. I just made it to interplanetary travel really not looking forward to going back to 18t launches....
All your current saves will not revert to Tier 1. They will remain the good ol' tier 3 KSC.
I was thinking about this too... what will happen to my Kerbals? Will they all become Level 1?
In sandbox, all your current Kerbals become maximum level. all new recruits start at level 0 or wherever they start. In career, I believe all Kerbals begin at the minimum level.
